name: MyDialogService
0:
”Alexa, open my dialog services”
”Alexa, ask my dialog services to check my star points balance”
”Alexa, open my dialog services and create an appointment”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my dialog services
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Artificial intelligent voice assistance for Dialog Axiata customers. Dialog Axiata PLC is Sri Lanka's premier Telekom provider. Now Dialog customers can avail of all Dialog value-added services, using the state-of-the-art "My Dialog Service " Skill for Amazon Alexa.
Through Doc 099 Services, creating a Doctor Channelling appointment service is available.
